snippet.title: The Elder Scrolls Online: Wrathstone - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The Season of the Dragon begins! Start a year-long, interconnected adventure that continues through the upcoming Elsweyr Chapter and beyond in Wrathstone, the latest DLC game pack for The Elder Scrolls Online. Traverse the glacial rifts of Frostvault and explore a sunken Ayleid city in Depths of Malatar as you search for both halves of the ancient and mysterious Wrathstone tablet in two challenging new dungeons. The Wrathstone DLC game pack is now live on PC/Mac and is coming to Xbox One and PlayStation 4 on March 12.

To learn more about The Elder Scrolls Online, visit these sites:

Official Site: https://www.elderscrollsonline.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ElderScrollsOnline
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TESOnline
Instagram: https://instagram.com/elderscrollsonline

ESRB Rating: MATURE with Blood and Gore, Sexual Themes, Use of Alcohol, and Violence. Online interactions not rated by the ESRB.
